snippet: Bob Bradley’s first competitive match as Egypt’s coach, a World Cup qualifier, was played behind closed doors after a series of tragic events befell soccer after the country’s revolution.
abstract: Egypt defeats Mozambique, 2-0, in World Cup qualifier, Egypt's first competitive match since Bob Bradley was hired as coach; match is played behind closed doors after a series of tragic events befell soccer after Egypt's revolution in 2011.
lead_paragraph: Bob Bradley’s first competitive match as Egypt’s coach, a World Cup qualifier, was played behind closed doors after a series of tragic events befell soccer after the country’s revolution.

headline.seo: For Bob Bradley and Egypt, a Higher Purpose After Violence
headline.print_headline: Out Of Dark, And Onto The Field
